thread.title: BRIEF-China Financial International Investments Expects HY Unaudited Profit Of About Hk$31 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Financial International Investments Expects HY Unaudited Profit Of About Hk$31 Million

organizations.name: reuters) - china financial international investments ltd

text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - China Financial International Investments Ltd:
* CHINA FINANCIAL INTERNATIONAL INVESTMENTS -‍EXPECTED TO RECORD UNAUDITED PROFIT OF ABOUT HK$31 MILLION FOR SIX MONTHS ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017​
* CHINA FINANCIAL INTERNATIONAL INVESTMENTS -EXPECTED RESULTS DUE ‍TO REALISED & UNREALISED GAIN ON LISTED INVESTMENTS AT FAIR VALUE THROUGH PROFIT/LOSS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
